channel.title: TheWalkingDead -TBMMO
channel.description:
TheWalkindDead is a online mmorpg that i am currently working on, it is a textbase game and i will be uploading updates daily along with 1 screenshot a day! I will also put down a list of featres please express your honest opinions ! i would love to improve on this project! [center][b][size=14pt]- Featres -[/size][/b][/center] [b]-Anti Cheat System[/b] The a staff pannel can view cash transfer, item transfer with user ips and multi account /ip notify etc . [b]-Integrated Paypal [/b] [b]-Inventory[/b] [b]-Jobs[/b] [b]-Events[/b] [b]-Shops[/b] (Player owned) [b]-Clan's -Challenges[/b] [b]-Jail System[/b] (If you are killed by a zombie you are jailed until someone rescues you or times up) [b]-Forums -Referal Gift -Banking System[/b] -Travelling (Different City's) [b]-Daily Rewards -Slot Machine -House system[/b](Base System) [b]-Mini Games[/b] [b]-Stats Bar -Level Up system[/b] (Stats) [b]-Donator Status Name -Avatars -Announcements -Buy Armors & Weapons -User Notes -Friends & Enemy List -Zombie Pabel[/b] [b]-Battle Arena[/b] (PVP) [b]-Reporting -Hall Of Fame -Assassination -Burn House -Raid bases -Premium Market -Battle Ladder -Votes & Polls[/b] [center][b][size=14pt]- Screens -[/size][/b][/center] [center]Day 1 -Login Screen-[/center] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/35kl8at.png[/img] [code]

Login and Kill some zombies!

Username :                           Password :

EOF; $IP = $IP = $_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR']; if(file_exists('ipbans/'.$IP)) { die("$ipban"); } $year=date('Y'); OUT; ?>[/code]

item.title: TheWalkingDead -TBMMO
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

Internal and external styling mixed
Very bad php ($IP = $IP = $_SERVER[‘REMOTE_ADDR’])
Deprecated HTML tags
Unneeded tags
Ridiculous method of styling the username and password headliners

I mean come on, these are beyond being beginner mistakes. I’ve not seen end of file indications in a long ass time either, not needed. This is only in a 20 line excerpt of code, it’s not looking good.

Acquire a book, read it, try again. Either that or finish other projects you have before trying to create an MMORPG with this standard of code.

Oh, looks like I found why the code was so outdated. I mean come on, do you guys still think people fall for this? https://github.com/sat312/Mafia-Game-Script/blob/master/login.php if you skip to the last few lines you’ll find pretty much the exact code you provided us. High 5 for us all doing our own work, huh?

Read full topic

“You will either kill or die or you will die and kill…” The worst one liner I have ever seen
[/quote]Makes sense though, si or no[/quote]
I guess it makes sense in this case since it’s zombies and they are technically dead and kill living people.

item.title: TheWalkingDead -TBMMO
item.dc:creator: @pkerjosh13 pkerjosh13
item.description:
@pkerjosh13 wrote:

TheWalkindDead is a online mmorpg that i am currently working on, it is a textbase game and i will be uploading updates daily along with 1 screenshot a day! I will also put down a list of featres please express your honest opinions ! i would love to improve on this project!

[center][size=14pt]- Featres -[/size][/center]

-Anti Cheat System
The a staff pannel can view cash transfer, item transfer with user ips and multi account /ip notify etc .
-Integrated Paypal
-Inventory
-Jobs
-Events
-Shops (Player owned)
-Clan’s
-Challenges
-Jail System (If you are killed by a zombie you are jailed until someone rescues you or times up)
-Forums
-Referal Gift
-Banking System
-Travelling (Different City’s)
-Daily Rewards
-Slot Machine
-House system(Base System)
-Mini Games
-Stats Bar
-Level Up system (Stats)
-Donator Status Name
-Avatars
-Announcements
-Buy Armors & Weapons
-User Notes
-Friends & Enemy List
-Zombie Pabel
-Battle Arena (PVP)
-Reporting
-Hall Of Fame
-Assassination
-Burn House
-Raid bases
-Premium Market
-Battle Ladder
-Votes & Polls

[center][size=14pt]- Screens -[/size][/center]
[center]Day 1 -Login Screen-[/center]

[code]

Login and Kill some zombies!

       <form method="post" action="authenticate.php" name="loginform" id="loginform">

Username :                           Password :

EOF;
$IP = $IP = $_SERVER[‘REMOTE_ADDR’];

if(file_exists(‘ipbans/’.$IP))
{
die("$ipban");
}
$year=date(‘Y’);

OUT;

?>[/code]

Read full topic
